snippet.title: Modern Combat: Sandstorm iPhone game trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on the App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/modern-combat-sandstorm/id329373748?mt=8

The official game trailer of the most stunning FPS game available on iPhone / iPod touch. Follow us on http://twitter.com/Modern_combat/

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
